citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 am on 12-
FEB-2024.
USDA arrived at the facility and called the contact number provided. Licensee answered the call and stated she was out
of town and could not be available for inspection.
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 am on 12-
FEB-2024. 
 
USDA arrived at the facility and called the contact number provided. Licensee answered the call and stated she was out 
of town and could not be available for inspection. 
 
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process. 
 
 
End Section
